title: FeltsnFun 2 Felt Story Boards | Zoo & Farm Scenes | Crease-Free & Double-Sided Fuzzy Felt Board for Toddlers | Premium Quality, Interactive & Educational
features: Double sided: With a farm storyboard scene on one side and a zoo scene on the other, you get two fantastic designs in one that are ideal for activities.
Easy to Hang: This large felt board (43 x 28 inches) is perfect for interactive play. It comes with 4 stainless steel eyelets and hooks for easy hanging or can be used as a play mat on the floor.
Includes 29 fun colourful characters and 26 words, all fully printed. Ideal for introducing young children to farm and zoo animals while enhancing their creativity and language skills.
Crease-free: We don’t fold the backdrop, we roll it for crease-free playing, ensuring your child enjoys the full experience as soon as it is opened. No need for ironing!
No Small Tabs: Our felt shapes are designed to stick directly to the board without the use of small tabs, offering a safe and easy-to-use play experience for young children.
description: Product Description Rolled in a Tube (NOT Folded), Ensuring Smooth, Crease-Free Fun (and it Looks Great Too!) What a gift! Standing 29" Tall With a 6" Diameter, Our Tubes Make an Impressive Gift! Welcome to the enchanting world of FeltsnFun, where imagination meets learning with our 'Zoo & Farm Scenes' felt play story board. We know how frustrated parents are with cheaper alternatives that have been folded to save money, only to leave annoying creases that cannot be ironed out. Our boards are carefully rolled into large tubes so that you never have to worry about that! We also provide two fun scenes for the price of one! Dive into a farm game one day and explore a bustling zoo the next, with 29 adorable characters and 26 essential words between them to enhance your child's vocabulary and storytelling skills, ensuring years of learning. Each scene measures 43" x 28" (1092mm x 711mm), providing lots of space for your little one's creativity to flourish. With four stainless steel eyelets and hooks included, it's easy to hang and perfect for any nursery or playroom, and the amazing packaging makes it a fantastic gift for any occasion. The bright colours and felt textures will engage any child, ensuring an interactive learning experience that helps with spelling and encourages motor skills and storytelling. FeltsnFun brings endless adventures in small-world play, encouraging creativity and learning with every piece. Discover the joy of hands-on learning with our Zoo & Farm Scenes, and watch your child's imagination take flight! No Tabs - Fully Printed - Strong, Stainless Steel Eyelets No Dangerous Tabs to Fall Off! Our felt characters and words are designed to adhere securely to the board, ensuring seamless placement without the need for sticky tabs or additional tools. The felt characters can be easily repositioned or swapped out, allowing for flexible and creative play that’s both safe and user-friendly. This thoughtful design makes every interaction with the storyboard enjoyable and hassle-free. All Shapes Fully Printed Our characters and words are fully printed onto felt, eliminating any loose or detachable pieces that could fall off during use. This design ensures a safer and more reliable play experience, reducing the risk of small parts becoming misplaced or causing inconvenience. The thoughtful construction adds durability and peace of mind, making our product ideal for creative learning and play. Strong, Stainless Steel Eyelets & Wall Hooks Our play boards are thoughtfully designed with durable stainless-steel eyelets in each corner, ensuring strength and longevity during use. To offer flexibility and convenience, every board comes equipped with four adhesive wall hooks. This allows you to choose between two engaging setups: place the board on the floor for interactive play or securely hang it on the wall to create a vertical experience. Whether your little ones prefer exploring on the ground or reaching for the stars, our versatile design lets them take the lead in deciding how they want to play! 29 Animals & Other Characters to Learn About 26 Words, the Perfect Size for Little Hands. Ideal for Teaching Phonetics and word association Interactive and Ideal for hours of fun and learning, Parent and Child Bonding. The FeltsnFun Zoo & Farm Felt Board Set is more than just a toy—it's a powerful educational tool designed to engage young minds while fostering key developmental skills. This double-sided play mat features a Zoo scene on one side and a Farm on the other, creating a dynamic and interactive learning environment. With 29 felt characters and 26 words included, it provides endless opportunities for imaginative play, learning, storytelling, and creative exploration. Beyond entertainment, this felt board set promotes critical learning benefits: Storytelling and Creativity : Children can craft their own stories, enhancing their creativity and narrative-building abilities while exploring life on the farm or in the zoo. Vocabulary Building : The inclusion of 26 words encourages early literacy and language development, helping kids expand their vocabulary in a fun, hands-on way. Motor Skills Development : Manipulating the felt characters and words improves fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination, essential for early childhood growth. Cognitive Skills : Matching characters to their words and scenes, and arranging pieces helps problem-solving and cognitive reasoning. Independent and Collaborative Play : Kids can play solo, fostering independence, or enjoy collaborative play with siblings or friends, teaching social skills and teamwork. Thoughtfully designed, the felt board is easy to use and safe for little hands, making it a must-have for parents and educators looking to combine fun and learning seamlessly. Whether your child is practicing new words, telling imaginative tales, or enhancing their motor skills, this set offers a well-rounded educational experience in a vibrant, engaging format.
